aboutQueryHub: Create queries, work with data fast and easily, and keep them all in one location.
queryHubDescription: Developers and analysts may work with APIs as effectively as possible with the help of QueryHub. QueryHub facilitates and eases the process of testing queries, analyzing responses, and managing projects.
loginError: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials.
registerError: Failed to sign up. Please try again.
questionAboutSignIn: Have a current account? Sign in
applicationToolsBlock1: Change the theme from light to dark and vice versa
applicationToolsBlock2: Go to RESTfull client, check your API and get responses to requests
applicationToolsBlock3: Go to GraphiQL client, use GraphiQL capabilities, process queries, get responses
applicationToolsBlock4: Go to History, see previous requests and responses
applicationToolsBlock5: You can change the language in the top right corner
graphqlYourFirstRequest: Make your first request with GraphQL
historyMessage: You haven't executed any requests yet
rssDescription: No matter your age, professional employment, or place of residence. RS School offers a unique learning experience as a free, community-based online education initiative
